title: Ansambul Stefan Bucur - Muzica Lautareasca Veche vol1&2
description:
Ansambul Stefan Bucur - Muzica Lautareasca Veche (Old Romanian Gypsy Music)

Stefan Bucur has recorded a lot of folkloric music during the communist years. With Ceacescu gone, he began recording authentic lautar music (which, allthough also recorded during the communist era, wasnt the way one made a career back then).
These recordings are among the best (in my taste) newer records showcasing the classic lautareasca repetoire.

*Volume 1 has been in my list of torrents for some weeks now. If you allready have it, just download vol 2.

vol 1

01. Pe drumul manastiresc / Sarba lui Titi Niculescu / Hora de la Artari
02. Stinge, Doamne, stelele
03. Tinerete, tinerete
04. Cantec de ascultare
05. Uite, mama, cade-o stea / Hora dela Micsunesti
06. Blestemat sa fii de stele / Tot am zis ma duc, ma duc
07. Nici nu ninge nici nu ploua
08. Hora peste picior
09. Foaie verde, foi de praz / Foiae verde, mar domnesc
10 Picaturi de untdelemn

Marian Alexandru (vioara) 
Viorel Fundament (acordeon) 
Marion Mirea (contrabas) 
Stefan Bucur (viola) 
Cristinel Tutturica (tambal)
